summary: An ordinance appropriating the sum of One Hundred Dollars ($100.00) out of the general fund of the City of Seattle to pay the claim of Cyndrene Matz for personal injuries received by said Cyndrene Matz on the 18th day of December 1917, at about 1:45 P.M. while alighting from the rear of a street car on Pike Street near the Northeast corner of Second Avenue, and authorizing the drawing of a warrant therefor.
